snippet.title: Crimson Desert - Official Reveal Trailer | Pearl Abyss Connect 2019
snippet.description:
Watch the official game reveal trailer for Crimson Desert, an upcoming open world action-adventure being developed by Pearl Abyss, the creators of the Black Desert franchise. 

Learn more: 
» https://crimsondesert.pearlabyss.com
» https://www.facebook.com/CrimsonDesert
» https://www.twitter.com/CrimsonDesert_

This trailer consists of actual in-game footage.

An Age of Fading Legends. A Saga Written in Blood.
Pearl Abyss' Project CD is being brought to life as Crimson Desert.
Enter a war-torn realm of medieval fantasy, where allegiances are tested and heroes are made.

Subscribe to the newsletter and follow Crimson Desert on social media to start your saga as well.

#CrimsonDesert #UpcomingGame #Trailer

About Pearl Abyss
Best known for the Black Desert franchise, Pearl Abyss is a leading developer in the game industry. Established in 2010, Pearl Abyss has since developed Black Desert for PC, mobile and console. With all its games built on its proprietary engine, Pearl Abyss' games are renowned for its cutting-edge graphics and action gameplay. The company has four new titles in the works and is poised to continue its growth through 2019 and beyond to maintain its position as one of Asia's leaders in game development.
